verses.verse: I Would <S%G3785><s%> Ye Were Bearing With <S%G430><s%> Me <S%G3450><s%> A Little <S%G3397><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In Folly; <S%G877><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Indeed <S%G2532><s%> Bear With <S%G430><s%> Me. <S%G3450><s%>

For I Am Jealous As To <S%G2206><s%> You <S%G1063><s%> Of God <S%G5209><s%> With <S%G2316><s%> The Jealousy, <S%G2205><s%> <S%G718><s%> For I Have Espoused <S%G1063><s%> For <S%G5209><s%> To One <S%G1520><s%> Man <S%G435><s%> A Virgin <S%G3933><s%> Chaste <S%G53><s%> To Present You <S%G3936><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

<S%G5399><s%> But I Fear <S%G1161><s%> Lest By Any Means <S%G3381><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Serpent <S%G3789><s%> Eve <S%G2096><s%> Deceived <S%G1818><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3834><s%> His Craftiness, <S%G846><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> Should Be Corrupted <S%G5351><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3540><s%> Your Thoughts <S%G5216><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Simplicity <S%G572><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> As To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> <S%G3303><s%> For If Indeed <S%G1063><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Comes <S%G2064><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Proclaims <S%G2784><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> We Did Not Proclaim, <S%G2784><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> A Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Different <S%G2087><s%> Ye Receive <S%G2983><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Ye Did Not Receive, <S%G2983><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> Different <S%G2087><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Ye Did Not Accept, <S%G1209><s%> Well <S%G2573><s%> Were Ye Bearing With It. <S%G430><s%>
I Reckon <S%G3049><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> In Nothing To <S%G3367><s%> Have Been Behind <S%G5302><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5228><s%> In A Surpassing Degree <S%G3029><s%> Apostles. <S%G652><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> Unpolished <S%G2399><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In Speech I Am, <S%G3056><s%> ' Yet <S%G235><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In Knowledge; <S%G1108><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Every Way <S%G3956><s%> Made Manifest <S%G5319><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> You. <S%G5209><s%>

Or <S%G2228><s%> <S%G266><s%> Did I Commit Sin, <S%G4160><s%> Myself <S%G1683><s%> Humbling <S%G5013><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Might Be Exalted, <S%G5312><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Gratuitously <S%G1432><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> I Announced <S%G2097><s%> To You? <S%G5213><s%>

Other <S%G243><s%> Assemblies <S%G1577><s%> I Despoiled, <S%G4813><s%> Having Received <S%G2983><s%> Wages <S%G3800><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Towards You <S%G5216><s%> Service. <S%G1248><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Being Present <S%G3918><s%> With <S%G4314><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Been Deficient, <S%G5302><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Did Lazily Burden <S%G2655><s%> No One, <S%G3762><s%> <S%G3588><s%> For The <S%G1063><s%> Deficiency <S%G5303><s%> Of Me <S%G3450><s%> Completely Filled Up <S%G4322><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brethern <S%G80><s%> Who Came <S%G2064><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Macedonia, <S%G3109><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Everything <S%G3956><s%> Not Burdensome <S%G4><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Myself <S%G1683><s%> I Kept <S%G5083><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Keep. <S%G5083><s%>

Is The <S%G2076><s%> Truth <S%G225><s%> Of Christ <S%G5547><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Me <S%G1698><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2746><s%> This Boasting <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Shall Not Be Sealed Up <S%G4972><s%> As To <S%G1519><s%> Me <S%G1691><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Regions <S%G2824><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Achaia. <S%G882><s%>

<S%G3739><s%> But What <S%G1161><s%> I Do, <S%G4160><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> I Will Do, <S%G4160><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> I May Cut Off <S%G1581><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Occasion <S%G874><s%> Of Those <S%G3588><s%> Wishing <S%G2309><s%> An Occasion, <S%G874><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G1722><s%> Wherein <S%G3739><s%> They Boast <S%G2744><s%> They May Be Found <S%G2147><s%> According As <S%G2531><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We. <S%G2249><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For Such Are <S%G5108><s%> False Apostles, <S%G5570><s%> Workers <S%G2040><s%> Deceitful, <S%G1386><s%> Transforming Themselves <S%G3345><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Apostles <S%G652><s%> Of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Wonderful Is It, <S%G2298><s%> <S%G846><s%> For Himself <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> Transforms Himself <S%G3345><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> An Angel <S%G32><s%> Of Light. <S%G5457><s%>

It Is Not <S%G3756><s%> A Great Thing <S%G3173><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1249><s%> His Sevants <S%G846><s%> Transforms Themselves <S%G3345><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Servants <S%G1249><s%> Of Righteousness; <S%G1343><s%> Of Whom <S%G3739><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> End <S%G5056><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2041><s%> Their Works. <S%G846><s%>

Again <S%G3825><s%> I Say, <S%G3004><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Should Think <S%G1380><s%> A Fool <S%G878><s%> To Be; <S%G1511><s%> <S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> Otherwise, <S%G3361><s%> Even <S%G2579><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Fool <S%G878><s%> Receive <S%G1209><s%> Me, <S%G3165><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Little <S%G3397><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> I Also <S%G2504><s%> May Boast. <S%G2744><s%>

What <S%G3739><s%> I Speak, <S%G2980><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Do I Speak <S%G2980><s%> According To The <S%G2596><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Folly, <S%G877><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Confidence <S%G5287><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Boasting. <S%G2746><s%>
Since <S%G1893><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Boast <S%G2744><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Flesh, <S%G4561><s%> I Also <S%G2504><s%> Will Boast. <S%G2744><s%>
<S%G2234><s%> For Gladly <S%G1063><s%> Ye Bear With <S%G430><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fools <S%G878><s%> Intelligent <S%G5429><s%> Being. <S%G5607><s%>

<S%G430><s%> For Ye Bear It <S%G1063><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Bring Into Bondage, <S%G2615><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Devour You, <S%G2719><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Take From You, <S%G2983><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Exalt Himself, <S%G1869><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> On <S%G1519><s%> The Face <S%G4383><s%> Beat. <S%G1194><s%>

As To <S%G2596><s%> Dishonour <S%G819><s%> I Speak, <S%G3004><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Were Weak; <S%G770><s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> ' <S%G1161><s%> But Wherein <S%G302><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> May Be Daring, <S%G5111><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Folly <S%G877><s%> I Speak, <S%G3004><s%> Am Daring <S%G5111><s%> I Also. <S%G2504><s%>

Hebrews <S%G1445><s%> Are They? <S%G1526><s%> I Also. <S%G2504><s%> Israelites <S%G2475><s%> Are They? <S%G1526><s%> I Also. <S%G2504><s%> Seed <S%G4690><s%> Of Abraham <S%G11><s%> Are They? <S%G1526><s%> I Also. <S%G2504><s%>

Servants <S%G1249><s%> Of Christ <S%G5547><s%> Are They? <S%G1526><s%> As Being Beside Myself <S%G3912><s%> I Speak, <S%G2980><s%> Above Measure <S%G5228><s%> I Too ; <S%G1473><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Labours <S%G2873><s%> More Abundantly, <S%G4056><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Stripes <S%G4127><s%> Above Measure, <S%G5234><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Imprisonments <S%G5438><s%> More Abundantly, <S%G4056><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Deaths <S%G2288><s%> Often. <S%G4178><s%>
From <S%G5259><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> Five Times <S%G3999><s%> Forty Stripes <S%G5062><s%> Except <S%G3844><s%> <S%G1520><s%> I Received. <S%G2983><s%>

Thrice <S%G5151><s%>, I Was Beaten With Rods, <S%G4463><s%> Once <S%G530><s%> I Was Stoned, <S%G3034><s%> Three Times <S%G5151><s%> I Was Shipwrecked <S%G3489><s%> A Night And A Day <S%G3574><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Deep <S%G1037><s%> I Have Passed : <S%G4160><s%>

In Journeyings <S%G3597><s%> Often, <S%G4178><s%> In Perils <S%G2794><s%> Of Rivers, <S%G4215><s%> In Perils <S%G2794><s%> Of Robbers, <S%G3027><s%> In Perils <S%G2794><s%> From My Own <S%G1537><s%> Race, <S%G1085><s%> In Perils <S%G2794><s%> From The <S%G1537><s%> Nations, <S%G1484><s%> In Perils <S%G2794><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> City, <S%G4172><s%> In Perils <S%G2794><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Desert, <S%G2047><s%> In Perils <S%G2794><s%> On The <S%G1722><s%> Sea, <S%G2281><s%> In Perils <S%G2794><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> Flase Brethern; <S%G5569><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> Labour <S%G2873><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Toil, <S%G3449><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Watchings <S%G70><s%> Often, <S%G4178><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Hunger <S%G3042><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thirst, <S%G1373><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Fastings <S%G3521><s%> Often, <S%G4178><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Cold <S%G5592><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Nakedness. <S%G1132><s%>

Besides <S%G5565><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Without, <S%G3924><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowding <S%G1999><s%> On Me <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3588><s%> ' <S%G2596><s%> Daily, <S%G2250><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cure <S%G3308><s%> Concerning All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Assemblies. <S%G1577><s%>

Who <S%G5101><s%> Is Weak, <S%G770><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Am Not Weak? <S%G770><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Is Offended, <S%G4624><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Do Burn? 4448 V-PPI-1S
If <S%G1487><s%> To Boast <S%G2744><s%> It Behoves, <S%G1163><s%> In The Things <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G769><s%> Concerning My Infirmity <S%G3450><s%> I Will Boast. <S%G2744><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Knows, <S%G1492><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Is <S%G5607><s%> Blessed <S%G2128><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ages, <S%G165><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Do Not Lie. <S%G5574><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> Damascus <S%G1154><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ethnarch <S%G1481><s%> Of Aretas <S%G702><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Was Guarding <S%G5432><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Of The Damascenes <S%G1153><s%> City, <S%G4172><s%> To Take <S%G4084><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Wishing. <S%G2309><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> A Window <S%G2376><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> A Basket <S%G4553><s%> I Was Let Down <S%G5465><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wall, <S%G5038><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Escaped <S%G1628><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> His Hands. <S%G846><s%>
